# Titanic 

---

# Set up

Packages to load if you are following along

```{r packages, message=FALSE}

# Loads the library
library(gganimate)
# Other libraries that will be used
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

---

# Data

```{r}
df <- read_csv('https://bryantstats.github.io/math421/data/titanic.csv')
df <- df %>% 
  mutate(Survived = as.character(Survived),
         Pclass = as.character(Pclass))

```



---

# Static Plot

.left-code[
```{r step5, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
df %>% ggplot(aes(x = Sex,
                  fill=Survived))+
  geom_bar(position = 'fill')
```

]
.right-plot[
```{r, ref.label = "step5", echo = FALSE,  fig.height = 6, fig.width = 7}
```
]



---

# Dynamic Plot

.left-code[
```{r step6, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
df %>% ggplot(aes(x = Sex,
                  fill=Survived))+
  geom_bar(position = 'fill')+
  transition_states(Pclass)#<<

```

]
.right-plot[
```{r, ref.label = "step6", echo = FALSE,  fig.height = 6, fig.width = 7}

```
]


---

# Dynamic Plot

.left-code[
```{r step7, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
df %>% ggplot(aes(x = Sex,
                  fill=Survived))+
  geom_bar(position = 'fill')+
  transition_states(Pclass) + #<<
  labs(title = 'Class: {closest_state}') #<<

```

]
.right-plot[
```{r, ref.label = "step7", echo = FALSE,  fig.height = 6, fig.width = 7}

```
]

---

# Static Plot

.left-code[
```{r step2, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
df %>% ggplot(aes(x = Fare,
           y = Age, color=Survived))+
  geom_point()
```

]
.right-plot[
```{r, ref.label = "step2", echo = FALSE,  fig.height = 6, fig.width = 7}
```
]



---

# Dynamic Plot

.left-code[
```{r step3, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
df %>% ggplot(aes(x = Fare,
           y = Age, color=Survived))+
  geom_point()+
  transition_states(Sex)+ #<<
  labs(title = 'Sex: {closest_state}') #<<

```

]
.right-plot[
```{r, ref.label = "step3", echo = FALSE,  fig.height = 6, fig.width = 7}

```
]
